entry.dcterms:subject: TDATA-B70
TDATA-B65a
TDATA-B65b
TDATA-B77
B65m is the matched file of the B65a and B65b surveys. The first block of the two surveys (Opinions) asked identical questions of the respondents of both samples, this made their linking possible.
SPSS portable datafile
